import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import './navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useCustom } from "../../Context/ShopContext"; export const Navbar = () => { const { getTotalCartItems } = useCustom() const location = useLocation() const [menu, setMenu] = useState(location.pathname); useEffect(() => { setMenu(location.pathname) }, [location]) u return ( <>

SHOPPER

  • setMenu('/')}>Shop {menu === "/" ?
    : <>}
  • setMenu('/mens')}>Men{menu === "/mens" ?
    : <>}
  • setMenu('/womens')}>Women{menu === "/womens" ?
    : <>}
  • setMenu('/kids')}>Kids{menu === "/kids" ?
    : <>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
{/*
